text: Armaan Malik (born 22 July 1995) is an Indian singer, songwriter, record producer, voice-over, performer and actor. He has sung in many languages which includes Hindi, Kannada, Telugu, Tamil, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Malayalam, Assamese, Punjabi, English and Urdu. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Indian singers Category:Singers from Mumbai Category:Bollywood playback singers
title: Armaan Malik
